item.name: BalanceAndTurnovers
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED 0 AS IndexOfSet, CASE WHEN CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.CashAssetsType, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.BankAccountPettyCash, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Currency, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountReceipt, 0 AS AmountExpense, 0 AS AmountCurReceipt, 0 AS AmountCurExpense, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.SecondPeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.MinutePeriod, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.HourPeriod, 0 AS Amount, 0 AS AmountCur FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers

item.name: TurnoversByItems
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED 1 AS IndexOfSet, CASE WHEN CashAssets.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE CashAssets.Recorder END AS Recorder, CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.CashAssetsType, CashAssets.BankAccountPettyCash, CashAssets.Currency, CashAssets.Item, 0 AS AmountOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountCurOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountCurClosingBalance, CASE WHEN CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) THEN CashAssets.Amount ELSE 0 END AS AmountReceipt, CASE WHEN CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) THEN CashAssets.Amount ELSE 0 END AS AmountExpense, CASE WHEN CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) THEN CashAssets.AmountCur ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurReceipt, CASE WHEN CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) THEN CashAssets.AmountCur ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurExpense, CASE WHEN CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) THEN CashAssets.Amount ELSE -CashAssets.Amount END AS Amount, CASE WHEN CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) THEN CashAssets.AmountCur ELSE -CashAssets.AmountCur END AS AmountCur, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, WEEK) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, TENDAYS) AS TenDaysPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, MONTH) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, QUARTER) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, YEAR) AS YearPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, MINUTE) AS HourPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, hour) AS MinutePeriod, CashAssets.Period AS SecondPeriod FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN CashAssets.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END

parameter.dcsat:name: DynamicPeriod
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Day) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Week) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.TenDays) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Month) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'MMM yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Quarter) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'q ""app."" yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.HalfYear) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'MM.yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Year) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'yyyy'") END
